name: Pearl Abrasives P4 Multi-Cut Rescue Utility Abrasive Blade
Group_Name: Pearl Abrasives P4 Multi-Cut Rescue Utility Abrasive Blade
meta_title: Pearl Abrasives P4 Multi-Cut Rescue Utility Abrasive Blade
small_image_label: Pearl Abrasives P4 Multi-Cut Rescue Utility Abrasive Blade
thumbnail_label: Pearl Abrasives P4 Multi-Cut Rescue Utility Abrasive Blade
short_description:
Excellent for metal studs and ductile iron. Provides up to 100X more life than traditional abrasive wheels when cutting meatls.

  • Extra long life

  • Fast clean cut

  • 12" to 16" blades have diamond electroplated side protection which protects the core, reduces heat and prevents binding.

  • Vacuum brazed technology fused to steel core for protection, durability and heat resistance.

  • Designed to be used on a variety of materials

  • Excellent for emergency situations

  • Dry cutting

name: Pearl Abrasives TC-1000 Titanium Carbide Tip Abrasive Blade
Group_Name: Pearl Abrasives TC-1000 Titanium Carbide Tip Abrasive Blade
meta_title: Pearl Abrasives TC-1000 Titanium Carbide Tip Abrasive Blade
small_image_label: Pearl Abrasives TC-1000 Titanium Carbide Tip Abrasive Blade
thumbnail_label: Pearl Abrasives TC-1000 Titanium Carbide Tip Abrasive Blade
short_description:
Pearls's Titanium Carbide Tip Metal Blade is designed to cut a variety of mild ferrous metals with fewer burs, less dust,and reduced material burning than abrasive products. It produces much longer life than traditional abrasive wheels. The Pearl TC-1000 is engineered with a triple chip design for added durability.

  • Titanium carbide for extra long life

  • Minimal Vibration

  • Triple chip design for added durability

  • Designed to be used on a variety of furrous materials

  • Cuts clean and cool

  • able to be re-sharpened

  • Titanium carbide for extra long life

  • Minimal Vibration

  • Triple chip design for added durability

  • Designed to be used on a variety of furrous materials

  • Cuts clean and cool

  • able to be re-sharpened
meta_keyword: Pearl Abrasives TC-1000 Titanium Carbide Tip Abrasive Blade

name: Pearl Abrasives Double Cut Carbide Bur
Group_Name: Pearl Abrasives Double Cut Carbide Bur
meta_title: Pearl Abrasives Double Cut Carbide Bur
small_image_label: Pearl Abrasives Double Cut Carbide Bur
thumbnail_label: Pearl Abrasives Double Cut Carbide Bur
short_description:
Pearl Abrasive Co. offers a new line of tungsten carbide burs in the most popular shapes and sizes. Pearl supplies both Double Cut carbide burs for ferrous metal as well as the Aluminum Cut for non-ferrous metals.

DOUBLE CUT

The most popular bur for ferrous materials. The flutes are precision ground in both left and right directions, offering aggressive stock removal and a smooth finish.

  • Precision ground tungsten carbide for aggressive cutting and long life

  • Double cut allows for a smooth operation little or no vibration

  • Ideal for smaller, hard to reach places

  • Excellent for welding, dressing, smoothing castings and shaping holes

  • 1/4" shank
meta_keyword: Pearl Abrasives Double Cut Carbide Bur

name: Crack-Chaser Diamond Blade - P2 Pro-V
meta_title: Crack-Chaser Diamond Blade - P2 Pro-V
small_image_label: Crack-Chaser Diamond Blade - P2 Pro-V
thumbnail_label: Crack-Chaser Diamond Blade - P2 Pro-V
description: Crack-Chaser Diamond Blade - P2 Pro-V
short_description:
• For cleaning, routing and repairing of cracks in concrete and most other building materials.

  • Size: 4 x 5/8-11

  • Max RPM: 13,700
summary: The Crack-Chaser has been engineered to quickly sink into cracks and crevices. Simply place the wheel on the crack and let the diamonds do the work. The special design enables the Crack-Chaser to produce a 1/2" wide 70° V-shaped groove. This has proven to be the most effective configuration for re-caulking and re-filling.
size_info: Pearl Abrasive Company Crack-Chaser Diamond Blade - P2 Pro-V
meta_keyword: Crack-Chaser Diamond Blade - P2 Pro-V

name: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P3
Group_Name: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P3
meta_title: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P3
meta_description: General Purpose, Waved Core Turbo - Original "Super Dry"
small_image_label: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P3
thumbnail_label: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P3
description: General Purpose, Waved Core Turbo - Original "Super Dry"
short_description: • For concrete, block, brick, natural stone, granite, marble, refractory material, soft stone, sand stone.
summary:
• Wave design features add stability to the steel core, thus eliminating warping problems.

  • The waved-core allows air to be drawn in through the matrix and across the core, reducing friction keeping the core cool.

  • While the blade is cutting, the debris (swarf) is removed from the cutting path via the waved-core tus extending the life of the blade.
meta_keyword: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P3

small_image_label: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P4
thumbnail_label: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P4
description: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P4
short_description: • For concrete, block, brick, natural stone, granite, marble, refractory material, soft stone, sand stone.
summary:
• Wave design features add stability to the steel core, thus eliminating warping problems.

  • The waved-core allows air to be drawn in through the matrix and across the core, reducing friction keeping the core cool.

  • While the blade is cutting, the debris (swarf) is removed from the cutting path via the waved-core tus extending the life of the blade.
meta_keyword: Turbo Rim Diamond Blades - P4

name: Pearl Blade Roller™ for Worm Drive Saws
meta_title: Pearl Blade Roller™ for Worm Drive Saws
small_image_label: Pearl Blade Roller™ for Worm Drive Saws
thumbnail_label: Pearl Blade Roller™ for Worm Drive Saws
description: "THE ORIGINAL" BLADE ROLLER™ - REMOVABLE ROLLING CARRIAGE FOR WORM DRIVE SAWS. No tools required! Non-marking wheels. Eliminate costly heavy equipment.
short_description:
• Increase cutting speed.
  • Make straight cuts.
  • Easily increase control and accuracy.
  • Will fit the following saws: Skil® HD77 & HD77 MAG; Skil® HD5860 (8-1/4"); Makita® Hypoid; Bosch® 1677M.
  • Available in 6-pack point of purchase display.
summary: USES: CUTTING concrete slab, marble, granite, Wonder Board®, plywood, stucco; MAKING tension relief lines in slab concrete; CREATING access cuts in slab concrete for plumbing and electrical retrofit; SCORING decorative lines in poured slab or ovelays; FABRICATING slab granite and marble countertops, floors, etc.; RIPPING long straight cuts on plywood sheeting; CREATING cutouts in stucco for retro fitting doors and windows.
meta_keyword: Pearl Blade Roller™ for Worm Drive Saws

name: Pearl Waterkit™ for Circular Saws
meta_title: Pearl Waterkit™ for Circular Saws
small_image_label: Pearl Waterkit™ for Circular Saws
thumbnail_label: Pearl Waterkit™ for Circular Saws
description: Water Kit for circular saws. CONTROLS DUST AND INCREASES TOOL LIFE!
short_description:
• Reduces the operator's levels of dangerous, cancer causing airborne pathogens, dust and fatigue!
  • Finger tip controls allow the minimal use of water, to help control the hazards to the environment created by wet cutting.
  • Cooling and lubricating with water will make your expensive diamond blades last up to 50% longer.
  • Cooling the blade also helps to cool the motor, thus extending the life of your saw.
  • Kit includes a UL Listed Ground Fault Circuit Interrupter to eliminate shock hazard.
  • Works well with your Blade Roller™.
summary: Includes: Ground Fault Circuit Interrupter, Blade Roller ball valve diverter assembly, Quick Release Coupler with 2 Rubber Gaskets, Flexible Plastic Tube, Plastic Nut, Hose Clamps.
meta_keyword: Pearl Waterkit™ for Circular Saws

short_description: The Pearl Hexpin® System has revolutionized floor preparation. Use the standard Hexpin® Plates or Hexpin® Blocks with our patented system of interchangeable Hexpins® for grinding, sanding, polishing and coating removal. Pearl’s unique spring-based technology allows the Hexpin® attachments to float easily over rough surfaces while the fluted plate design helps maintain dust control. Engineered for use on standard floor buffers and dual-headed diamond grinders, the Pearl Hexpin® System is a tool that gives you choices. When looking to increase productivity and profitability, look to Pearl Professional Products for true craftsmanship... THE PEARL HEXPIN® SYSTEM.
meta_keyword: 15" Hexpin® Hexplates™ for 17" or 18" Buffers - 15" Plate w/ 12 Gold Dia. Pins

name: 15" Hexpin® Hexplates™ with SuperClutch™ - 15" Plate w/ 6 Dia. Segmented Pads

thumbnail_label: 15" Hexpin® Hexplates™ with SuperClutch™ - 15" Plate w/ 6 Dia. Segmented Pads
short_description:
• Super Clutch™ will disengage if the Hexpin® Plate hits an obstruction (i.e. bolts).
  • Super Clutch™ is self resetting.
  • Manually resetting torque locks (red tabs) inside clutch housing will keep clutch from disengaging.
  • Protects operator from injury, protects buffer from damage and keeps buffer coupler from breaking.
  • Simply turn off buffer and restart - less downtime.
  • Easy manual disengagement.
